# Code Checks

```{r code-check-tools}
requireNamespace("codetools")

```

```{r run-code}
setwd("path_disabled_src/")
table_files <- dir(".", pattern = "\\.*\\.R$")

for (i in table_files) {
  cat("\n]n***",i,"***\n\n")
  try(source(file = i, echo = TRUE, verbose = TRUE))
}
```
